select * from ( select tr1.* from t_role tr1 where tr1.del_flag = 0 and tr1.role_visibility = 0 union select tr.* from t_role tr, t_role_tenant trt where tr.del_flag = 0 and trt.del_flag = 0 and tr.role_visibility = 2 and tr.id = trt.role_id and trt.tenant_id in (select trdp.ref_id from t_role_data_permission trdp where trdp.type = 0 and trdp.role_id = #{roleId}) ) tall where 1=1
and role_name like concat('%',#{roleName},'%')
and enable_status = #{enableStatus}
order by id desc

select count(role_name) from t_role where del_flag = 0 and role_name = #{roleName}

from t_role where del_flag = 0 and role_name = #{roleName} limit 1
